name: Spacecat Adventure!
description:
Here's a little platformer game I made just for fun and practice! There's not much different in this game from other platformers, but I hope you enjoy this silly lil game!

On desktop, you can press f4 to make the window larger

On web, you can press f4 and then press the "go fullscreen" button. This is to make the game higher quality before making it fullscreen (sorry I don't know how to make it just one button)

You can't save your game on the web version right now, only on the desktop version.

The save file should be in C:\Users\"Username"\AppData\Roaming\LOVE\SpacecatAdventure\data.lua on Windows

Theres a little cutscene at the end, but the web version can't load videos, so it's only on the desktop verson.
